english_example_sentence: If the old phone fell on the concrete floor, it would break immediately.
russian_example_sentence: Если старый телефон упал бы на бетонный пол, он бы сразу разбился.
turkish_example_sentence: Eski telefon beton zemine düşse hemen kırılır.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Eski telefon beton zemine ______ hemen kırılır.
